title: Until a vaccine arrives
description:
Why the pandemic’s future is hard to predict, and why the vaccine could take much longer than 12-to-18 months.

Featuring:
Brian Resnick (@B_Resnick)
German Lopez (@germanrlopez)

Links to Resources Discussed:
The pandemic, chaos, and coming to terms with uncertainty
A coronavirus vaccine may take longer than 12 to 18 months

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
